citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
A documented, veterinary approved environmental enhancement plan for birds is not in place at the facility, although the
birds are living in an enriched environment. Environmental enhancement supports the psychological welfare of the birds.
The facility must ensure that an environmental enhancement plan is in place and utilized.
Correct by November 26, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
n

Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
A documented, veterinary approved environmental enhancement plan for birds is not in place at the facility, although the 
birds are living in an enriched environment. Environmental enhancement supports the psychological welfare of the birds. 
The facility must ensure that an environmental enhancement plan is in place and utilized.
